Welcome to the game of roulette, here you can win or lose EVERYTHING, choose your bet style below, then specify what you want to bet

**BET TYPES:**
roleta.title: Roulette
roleta.lowhigh-value:
Bet between high numbers (19 to 36) or low numbers (1 to 18)
BASE PROFIT: **1:1**
YOUR MAXIMUM PROFIT: **{{profit}}** :star:
roleta.oddeven-value:
Bet on Odd or Even numbers
BASE PROFIT: **1:1**
YOUR MAXIMUM PROFIT: **{{profit}}** :star:
roleta.color-value:
Bet between red and black
BASE PROFIT: **1:1**
YOUR MAXIMUM PROFIT: **{{profit}}** :star:
roleta.dozens-value:
Bet on one of three dozen
BASE PROFIT: **2:1**
YOUR MAXIMUM PROFIT: **{{profit}}** :star:
roleta.split-value:
You can bet on adjacent numbers
BASE PROFIT: **5:1**
YOUR MAXIMUM PROFIT: **{{profit}}** :star:
roleta.straight-up-value:
You can bet on a single number
BASE PROFIT: **9:1**
YOUR MAXIMUM PROFIT: **{{profit}}** :star:

arena.same-user: HAHAHA look at that guy wanting to battle himself, tag someone else there namoral
arena.user-not-configurated: {{user}} doesn't have all blessings configured for battle! Use `/arena configure` to set your blessings
arena.description:
Welcome to the arena **{{author}}** and **{{enemy}}**!

You will be pitted against each other in a friendly battle! No one will suffer death penalties or At the start of the battle, both will have maximum health and mana, and this value will not change on your adventurer sheet.

**{{author}}** you can select below if the battle will be with your current levels, or if it will be fair to the **battle level**. The battle will only start when you both click READY. You have 20 seconds to decide

**Battle Level:** All players are level **{{level}}** with **ALL** class skills at level **{{abilityLevel}}** Blessings are distributed according to user configuration

Level of {{author}}: **{{authorLevel}}**
{{enemy}}Level: **{{enemyLevel}}**
arena.ask-change-battle-type: Hey {{author}}, **{{user}}** asked to change battle mode!

configurate.success-points: Your battle settings have been adjusted!
configurate.title: Friendly Battle Settings
configurate.description:
Prepare for a friendly battle by fixing your status. You have in total **{{vitality}}** vitality blessings and **{{battle}}** battle blessings to use. Remembering that these blessings are only valid for friendly battles at **Battle Level**

Choose below which status you want to change.
**NOTE:** The number you put will be SET, that is, the amount of blessings you put in a status is what it will stay. Not typing anything makes that status not change, keeping the value before opening the form!

ficha.description:
**ATTENTION**

By clicking the button below, you will erase ALL your **RPG data**
Your Menhera account will still exist, only your data regarding the RPG will be lost

This will only cause your character to be deleted. You will be able to create another character whenever you want.

Stats such as PvP wins will still be linked to your account.

Are you sure you want to do this?

estatisticas.embed_description:
Hi my name is **{{name}}**, and I'm a Brazilian Bot for Discord with a focus on fun and RPG! I was created in **{{createdAt}}** and joined this server in **{{joinedAt}}**.

A little bit about me: My name is Menhera, I am 16 years old and I LOVE, I mean, I LOOOOVE to use these faces: (>...<). To learn more, go to my [twitter](https://twitter.com/__MenheraBot), my [support server](https://discord.gg/fZMdQbA) and my [WEBSITE](https://menherabot.xyz).

calvo.text:
**{{name}}** baldness

> {{user}} has baldness type **{{type}}** and is in the **{{stage}}**
{{description}}

"___We are born from baldness, from baldness we will die...___" - {{author}}, 2018

descriptions.0-0: At the beginning of everything, your life will still be problematic in the future, but don't despair, baldness will always reign, and we shouldn't be afraid of it!
descriptions.0-1: Your forehead starts to stand out, they must have called you a mosquito airport, but don't be shaken, what's theirs is kept!
descriptions.0-2: You already look more like a priest of old, you've lost hope of recovering what was once most sacred to you, and all you have to do is hand over the rest of your hair
descriptions.0-3: The end, not even an implant should solve the problem, baldness won, don't fight anymore, now just rest... Rest and enjoy this new life, the life of those who lived, and experienced it!
descriptions.1-0: Voc√™ percebe que est√° come√ßando e sabe que n√£o pode parar, a luta agora vai ser de quanto tempo vai demorar para a calvice te derrotar
descriptions.1-1: Donut! That's what they call you. At that moment you start wearing caps and hats to hide what you feel ashamed of, baldness is starting
descriptions.1-2: You don't use shampoo anymore, the only thing you use is furniture polish to make your beautiful bald spot shine. You've been through a lot, so you don't care what others say
descriptions.1-3: So that's it, the end has come. The baldness beat you, nothing more can be done. But, it wasn't a defeat! It was a victory! For going through the worst kind of baldness possible, and finally reaching the The end!
descriptions.2-0: It's the beginning of a new life. You look in the mirror and realize what you didn't want. You're going bald, and you know it, you just haven't accepted it yet
descriptions.2-1: Two side entries appear on your head, you are relieved that your baldness is the most common of all, and also the most charming.
descriptions.2-2: Your hair looks more like a pre-tsunami tide receding. You don't care what happens to your hair, you are an acceptor, a person who accepts baldness as it is
descriptions.2-3: This is your end, the same as all the other bald ones. You didn't want to get to this point, your baldness was beautiful, and now, it's just one more on the list of those who now, no longer have nothing else
descriptions.3-0: The day has come, the day you realize you're starting to go bald, the only plea you have is not to be the **O** type. Let it be anything but the **O** type. THE
descriptions.3-1: You don't believe in yourself. It couldn't be worse, you realize that your baldness starts as a type O. At least you can hide your top with a hat, and be proud of the charm that type M brings your head
descriptions.3-2: You can't hide it, everyone knows you're a mix. But you don't let yourself be shaken, and of course it tells everyone and everything that you're just cutting Ronaldinho Ga√∫cho.
descriptions.3-3: The end of the ends. You are grateful to have had this baldness. As much as you didn't trust it at first, and that you were afraid of what others would think, you won, and made it to the end. Congratulations champion !

poker.public-not-released: Public matches are not released yet
poker.open-not-released: Open matches are not released yet
poker.private-not-enough-players: To start a private match, you need at least 2 players
poker.already-accepted: You have already enter this table! Wait the game to start
poker.private-users-banned: This match cannot start! Someone is banned of using Menhera
poker.match-canceled: This poker table has been canceled! {{reason}}
poker.only-owner-cancel: Only the creator of the command can cancel the match!
poker.only-owner-start: Only the creator of the command can start the match before all players are ready!
poker.cannot-start-poor: This poker table could not be started! Someone has less than **{{minBet}}** :star:

private-accept-embed.title: {{author}} started a Poker Table!
private-accept-embed.description:
Invited to Participate: {{invites}}

Choose if you want to join the table using the buttons below!

poker.private-users-already-in-match: You can't start this match! Some users are already in a poker table

replies.call-or-raise: You need to make a bet!
replies.not-active-bet: There are no active bets! Make one or check!
replies.cannot-request-control: You can't check your cards at this moment!
replies.raise-nan: You raised with an invalid number!
replies.raise-too-low: You raised with a bet smaller than the last bet!
replies.raise-too-high: You raised with a bet bigger than your chip stack!
replies.table-close: What a beautiful game!! This Poker Table has been closed!
replies.not-turn: Hey, wait a minute! It's **{{user}}** time to play!
replies.round-finish:
Game over! Winner: **{{winner}}**. Chips won: **{{chips}}** :star:
Do you want to continue playing?

control-message.can-close-ephemeral: You may close this message now!
